description: The mission of LaSalle-Backus Educational Campus is to provide a comprehensive, quality education for the students in the community. We seek to support children academically and socially as they become successful and productive citizens. We exist as a hub for community support and as a resource for all stakeholders.
transit: R1, R2, R5 (Fort Totten - Adelphi/Calverton), E4, E2 (Riggs Rd/Ivy City - Friendship Heights), F1, F2 (Takoma Station - Cheverly), K6 (White Oak - Fort Totten)
